sn55.14:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sabbaduggatibhayam samatikkanto hoti.
sn55.14:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.14:1.4: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.14:1.7: ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.14:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sabbaduggatibhayam samatikkanto hoti”ti.
